app.name: WiiFlow Mod6
app.long_description:
WiiFlow is an app for loading backup games from a USB Device or SD card. It displays your games in a coverflow with 3D full box covers.
Key features: * Emulated NAND support * Plugin system for emu apps * Nintendont support * Neek2o support * Wii and GameCube disc dumper * GameTDB and plugin database support
